comment: A Dirichlet character is a monoid homomorphism from the multiplicative monoid on ` Z/nZ ` to the multiplicative monoid of ` CC ` , which is zero off the group of units of ` Z/nZ ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
